H0.text: Gender determination is the method of haplodiploidy exhibited by many species of rotifers.

H1.text: Circulation is a method of haplodiploidy that many species of rotifers exhibit.

H2.text: Digestion is the method of haplodiploidy exhibited by many species of rotifers.

H3.text: Respiration is the method of haplodiploidy exhibited by many species of rotifers.

A4.text: Haplodiploidy occurs sporadically in some spider mites, Hemiptera, Coleoptera (bark beetles), and rotifers.
